title: Cant chat?
body: hey, i log in after update and the bottom left corner is the icons for chat and groups and notifications. The thing is is that the yare all flashing in an even pattern but i cant click on them so i cant chat or join games when invited or even see my friends online anymore. pelase help!

replies.body:
Hey iRektU,

It sounds like your client may be corrupted. Please try [**Repairing Your Client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article). Let me know whether that resolves the issue!
